ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: NHS England North (Greater Manchester Health and Social Care Partnership)

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: NHS England North (Greater Manchester Health and Social Care Partnership)

TITLE.P: Market Engagement Event for Community Dental Services for Greater Manchester

SHORT_DESCR.P: Greater Manchester Health and Social Care Partnership dental commissioning team, are hosting a market engagement event to discuss the upcoming procurement of community dental services in Greater Manchester and consider options for the development of a high quality and effective service for the patients in the Greater Manchester localities in line with both emerging national guidance and increasing demand.
This facilitated event will primarily focus on, but not limited to:

Greater Manchester Health and Social Care Partnership wishes to invite views from potential providers on the potential service models for the delivery of community dental services in Greater Manchester and is undertaking a market engagement exercise.

The event will be held on 29 January 2018 from 4 p.m. until 6 p.m. (registration from 3:30 p.m.) at 3 Piccadilly Place, London Road, Manchester M1 3BN. Upon arrival, please report to the main reception desk, http://www.gmhsc.org.uk.
NECS is utilising an electronic tendering system to manage this market engagement and communicate with potential providers.
To register to attend the event, please register on the electronic tendering portal, which can be found at: https://www.proactisplaza.com/SupplierPortal/?CID=NECS.

Once registered, you will be able to view details of the tender opportunity by selecting the “Opportunities” box, and then searching for “Community Dental Services Market Engagement" (Reference NHSE203). Once registered on the portal, please confirm your attendance via the Messages area within the project.
Please note that the deadline for registering to attend the event is 5 p.m. 22 January 2018 and that places will be limited to 3 representatives per organisation.
It is free to register on the portal, which can be accessed at any time of the day.

If you require further assistance using the portal, help guides can be found on each stage of the process by clicking the “?” icon at the top right hand of the page. Alternatively, (should potential providers have any queries), a dedicated helpdesk is available and can be contacted via email: http://proactis.kayako.com/suppliernetwork/Core/Default/Index. The helpdesk will be open Monday to Friday 9 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. Please be aware that all communications and submissions will be conducted via the NECS Proactis portal only.

INFO_ADD.P: Please note that this facility allows the provider to express an interest only in delivering this service, it is not a Pre-Qualification Process.
To register to attend the event, please register on the electronic tendering portal, which can be found at: https://www.proactisplaza.com/SupplierPortal/?CID=NECS.

Once registered, you will be able to view details of the tender opportunity by selecting the “Opportunities” box, and then searching for “Community Dental Services Market Engagement" (Reference NHSE203). Once registered on the portal, please confirm your attendance via the Messages area within the project.
Please note that the deadline for registering to attend the event is 5 p.m. 22 January 2018 and that places will be limited to 3 representatives per organisation.
All communications relating to this market engagement event will be conducted via the Proactis portal.
It is free to register on the portal, which can be accessed at any time of the day.

If you require further assistance using the portal, help guides can be found on each stage of the process by clicking the “?” icon at the top right hand of the page. Alternatively, (should potential providers have any queries), a dedicated helpdesk is available and can be contacted via email: http://proactis.kayako.com/suppliernetwork/Core/Default/Index. The helpdesk will be open Monday to Friday 9 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. Please be aware that all communications and submissions will be conducted via the NECS Proactis portal only.
Please note that this facility allows the provider to express an interest only in delivering this service, it is not a Pre-Qualification Process.
Note: To register your interest in this notice and obtain any additional information, please visit the myTenders website at: http://www.myTenders.org/Search/Search_Switch.aspx?ID=206140.
